Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if it's possible to import prefabs from Unity into the game somehow? I'm not really talking about parts but prefabs for stuff like particle effects. Also, does anyone know what the purpose of the Particle Emitter section of PartTools is, I mean yeah you can play around with some particle effects in Unity but I don't really see how you would transfer whatever you made into the game. Maybe I'm missing something obvious?

Edited September 3, 2013 by AncientGammoner
The particle emitter in part tools is broken, or so I've been told/heard.
